server.persistence.dao

Class GameDAOInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.persistence.dao.GameDAOInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAOInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NonrelationalGameDAO, RelationalGameDAO

    public abstract class GameDAOInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements DAOInterface
    Parent class to determine what a DAO for a Game should implement
    Author:
    raulvillalpando

    • Method Detail

      • createGame

        public abstract boolean createGame(java.lang.String name,
                 boolean randomTiles,
                 boolean randomPorts,
                 boolean randomNumbers)
        Create a new Game
        Parameters:
        name - The title or name of the new game.
        randomTiles - Boolean to indicate if the game will have random tile locations.
        randomPorts - Boolean to indicate if the game will have random port locations.
        randomNumbers - Boolean to indicate if the game will have random number locations.
        Returns:
        True if the game got added successfully, False otherwise.

      • getGame

        public abstract Game getGame(int gameId)
        Get a game with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        gameId - The ID of the game to fetch.
        Returns:
        The game with the ID provided.

      • listGames

        public abstract java.util.List<Game> listGames()
        List all the game created and currently playing
        Returns:
        A list of all the games created and currently playing.

      • saveGame

        public abstract boolean saveGame(Game game)
        Save or update the state of the existing game
        Parameters:
        game - The game that contains the ID and all the information to update
        Returns:
        True if the game got updated or saved successfully, False otherwise.
